title: Ruleta Web
description: Ruleta Web es una herramienta gratuita en línea para crear ruletas personalizadas. Diseña y comparte fácilmente tus ruletas originales con elementos y probabilidades a tu gusto. Ideal para sorteos en eventos o decisiones diarias, y no requiere registro.
excerpt: Ruleta Web es una herramienta que te permite crear y compartir fácilmente ruletas personalizadas. Crea tu propia ruleta original y diviértete con amigos y familiares.

about.title: Acerca de
about.description: Ruleta Web es una herramienta de creación de ruletas personalizadas diseñada para un uso intuitivo. Esta página presenta el propósito del desarrollo del sitio y sus posibles usos. Nuestro objetivo es apoyar la toma de decisiones justas y divertidas en cualquier ocasión.
about.subtitle: Una herramienta intuitiva de creación de ruletas personalizadas para todos
about.section1Content: 'Ruleta Web' fue desarrollado para proporcionar una herramienta de creación de ruletas personalizadas que cualquiera puede usar de manera fácil e intuitiva. Nuestro objetivo es ayudarte a tomar decisiones justas mientras te diviertes en diversas situaciones, desde pequeñas decisiones diarias hasta sorteos de eventos.
about.section2Content: Está destinado a una amplia gama de usuarios, desde uso personal hasta fines comerciales y educativos, como decidir un lugar para almorzar con amigos, sortear castigos para streamers en vivo, seleccionar estudiantes en el aula o elegir ganadores para eventos en línea.
about.section3Content: Agradecemos sinceramente tus comentarios. Los utilizaremos como referencia para futuros desarrollos, así que no dudes en contactarnos a través de la página de contacto.

howToUse.title: Cómo usar
howToUse.description: Aprende todo, desde lo básico de 'Ruleta en la Web' hasta las funciones convenientes disponibles después de registrar una cuenta. Domina cómo crear y compartir ruletas, usar plantillas y aprovechar al máximo nuestro sitio.

basic.title: Uso Básico (para Invitados)
basic.create: Cómo crear una ruleta (agregar/eliminar elementos, cambiar proporciones/colores)
basic.create_description: Aprende a crear tu propia ruleta original configurando libremente los elementos, los colores y las proporciones.

create_detail_structured.step1_content: First, enter the 'Title' and 'Description' for your roulette. The title helps distinguish it from other roulettes, and the description is useful for explaining its purpose. Set them up to be clear for others.
create_detail_structured.step2_content: Next, use the 'Add Item' button to add options to the roulette. For each item, you can freely set its display 'Name' and an identifying 'Color'. You can intuitively pick colors from the color picker.
create_detail_structured.step3_content: You can set a 'Ratio' for each item. This is a number that indicates how likely that item is to be selected. For example, if you set 'A: 2, B: 1', A will be twice as likely to be chosen as B. If you want all items to have the same probability, enter the same number for all.
create_detail_structured.step4_content: Once you've configured all the items, your original roulette is complete! Check it in the preview and you can start the draw anytime with the 'Spin' button.

basic.spin_description: Explica el procedimiento para girar la ruleta creada y comprobar los resultados del sorteo.

spin_detail_structured.step1_content: The roulette you created and configured is displayed in the preview area. When you click the 'Spin' button in the center, the roulette will start to spin vigorously.
spin_detail_structured.step2_content: When the rotation stops, the selected item is highlighted, and the result is displayed prominently in the center of the screen. A fun confetti animation will liven up the moment of the draw!
spin_detail_structured.step3_content: If you want to spin the roulette again with the same settings, just click the 'Spin Again' button on the result screen. You can start the next draw right away.

basic.share_description: Aprende a compartir los resultados de tu ruleta con amigos o en redes sociales a través de una URL o como una imagen.

share_detail_structured.step1_content: After spinning the roulette, you can share it from the result screen or the 'Share' button on the settings screen. You can choose between two sharing options: 'Share via URL' and 'Share as Image'.
share_detail_structured.step2_content: When you select 'Share via URL', the URL of the page reflecting the current roulette settings (results not included) is copied to your clipboard. Paste this URL to friends or on social media, and anyone can experience the same roulette.
share_detail_structured.step3_content: When you select 'Share as Image', the current look of the roulette is downloaded as an image file (PNG format). This is useful for announcing event results or for sharing visually.

account.title: Funciones de la Cuenta
account.merit: Beneficios del registro de cuenta (guardado de datos, etc.)
account.merit_description: Descubre las funciones convenientes que se habilitan al registrarte para obtener una cuenta gratuita.

merit_detail_structured.benefit1_content: When you create an account, you can save your created roulettes to 'My Page'. This saves you the trouble of recreating the same roulette every time, allowing you to call up and use your favorite settings at any time.
merit_detail_structured.benefit2_content: By logging in, you can access your saved roulettes from any device. For example, you can use a roulette created on your PC at home from your smartphone on the go.
merit_detail_structured.benefit3_content: You can publish your masterpiece roulettes as 'templates' that other users can also use. Your ideas might be helpful to someone around the world. You can change the publication settings at any time.

account.auth: Pasos para nuevo registro e inicio de sesión
account.auth_description: Explica cómo crear una nueva cuenta y los pasos para iniciar sesión después del registro.

auth_detail_structured.step1_content: Proceed to the account creation page from the 'Sign Up' button in the header menu. The only required information is 'Username', 'Email Address', and 'Password'. After entering, click the button to complete the registration.
auth_detail_structured.step2_content: Once you have created an account, log in from the 'Login' page by entering your registered email address and password. Your login state will be maintained, so there is no need to enter it every time.
auth_detail_structured.step3_content: As an easier login method, we also support social login using a Google account. Just click the 'Login with Google' button to start using the service immediately without any tedious input.

loggedIn.title: Funciones Adicionales Después de Iniciar Sesión
loggedIn.mypage: Mi Página: Gestiona las ruletas creadas (editar/eliminar) y edita tu perfil.
loggedIn.mypage_description: Explica cómo gestionar tus ruletas guardadas en la página dedicada 'Mi Página' para usuarios que han iniciado sesión.

mypage_detail_structured.step1_content: While logged in, click on your username in the header menu or the 'My Page' link to go to your dedicated page.
mypage_detail_structured.step2_content: On My Page, all the roulettes you have saved are displayed in a list. From here, you can change the settings with the 'Edit' button for each roulette, or delete unnecessary ones with the 'Delete' button.
mypage_detail_structured.step3_content: By changing the 'Public Settings' for each roulette, you can publish it as a template that other users can use. You can also set up your public profile information from 'Edit Profile' to let other users know who created the template.

loggedIn.templates: Función de Plantilla: Cómo usar plantillas y hacer públicas tus propias ruletas.
loggedIn.templates_description: Aprende a encontrar y utilizar plantillas creadas por otros usuarios, y a publicar tus propias ruletas como plantillas.

templates_detail_structured.step1_content: On the 'Find from Templates' page, various roulettes created by other users are published. Find interesting templates by searching with keywords or sorting by newest or most popular.
templates_detail_structured.step2_content: When you find a template you like, click the 'Use this Template' button. This will open a new roulette creation screen with all the settings of that template (items, colors, ratios, etc.) inherited. All you have to do is customize it freely.
templates_detail_structured.step3_content: To publish your own roulette as a template, first go to My Page. In the 'Public Settings' of the roulette you want to publish, turn on 'Publish as Template', and other users will be able to use your roulette.

advanced.title: Advanced Features
advanced.original_roulette_description: Learn the steps to create your very own completely original roulette. Shape your ideas from scratch, without being tied to other templates.

original_roulette_detail_structured.step1_content: The greatest feature of the original roulette function is the ability to create your own roulette from a completely blank state, without relying on existing templates. First, decide on a title and description for your roulette on the creation page and take the first step of your idea.
original_roulette_detail_structured.step2_content: You can add as many options as you like with the 'Add Item' button. Give each item a unique name and set your favorite color with the color picker to aim for a visually fun roulette.
original_roulette_detail_structured.step3_content: By adjusting the 'Ratio' of each item, you can finely control the winning probability. Design the lottery logic as you wish, such as making a specific item more likely to win, or making all items equal.
original_roulette_detail_structured.step4_content: If you are logged into your account, you can record the completed roulette on My Page with the 'Save' button. You can also use the 'Share' function to broadcast your unique roulette to the world via URL or image.
